mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Adams, Ephram A.

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Adams, Ephram A. Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound right thigh and left leg. Location Wounded: Cumberland. Date Wounded: 1865/02/11. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Treatment: Furlough 1865/04/04. Result: Returned to duty 1865/04/04. Reinstated 1865/04/04. Deserted on furlough 1864/04/28..
